title: North American sports market size 2009 to 2023
yAxis: Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 15.
Overall Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 83.1 was reached at Year 2023
Minimum Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 48.73 was reached at Year 2009
